text: The entire area of the Anacostia River and Flats reclaimed and to be reclaimed from the mouth of the river to the District line is made and declared a part of the park system of the District of Columbia and designated Anacostia Park.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., ยง 8-155.

1973 Ed., ยง 8-161.

Miscellaneous Notes

Tree nursery: Act of May 7, 1926, 44 Stat. 405, ch. 251, transferred to the jurisdiction of the District of Columbia a certain portion of Anacostia Park for use as a tree nursery.

DC CODE ยง 10-155

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Parks, Public Buildings, Grounds, and Space. (Refs & Annos)
